guide.conclusion: Fun costume to make. Only a handful of people knew what I was, but it was a blast anyway.

flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction_rendered:
Relevant parts
  • EL wire
  • Sequencer/battery pack
  • phone or mp3 player
  • Amplifier, mini, portable
  • plastic flexible beading thread
  • Tapestry needle
  • Hot Glue gun & hot glue
  • papier-mâché (newspaper, flour, water)
  • Sewing materials
  • old T-shirt
  • pair of black pants

parts.notes: red, orange, yellow, green, blue, purple
fabric - tan, pink, hot pink, gray, and black

lines.text: Wrap a balloon in papier-mâché, let dry, and craft ears with rolled-up newspaper. Get a kitten to help you.
lines.text_raw: Wrap a balloon in papier-mâché, let dry, and craft ears with rolled-up newspaper. Get a kitten to help you.

lines.text: Cut a hole for your melon to fit through and some eye holes in Nyan cat's mouth.
lines.text_raw: Cut a hole for your melon to fit through and some eye holes in Nyan cat's mouth.

lines.text: Stuff the inside of the head with material or newspaper so your head fits securely/comfortably inside.
lines.text_raw: Stuff the inside of the head with material or newspaper so your head fits securely/comfortably inside.

lines.text: Sew a big tan rectangle for the pop tart, leaving holes for arms, head and the entire bottom portion open like a T-shirt.
lines.text_raw: Sew a big tan rectangle for the pop tart, leaving holes for arms, head and the entire bottom portion open like a T-shirt.

lines.text: Sew a T-shirt or sweatshirt inside the pop tart, closing up around the arm and neck holes - this makes it so you can add stuffing to the shoulders.
lines.text_raw: Sew a T-shirt or sweatshirt inside the pop tart, closing up around the arm and neck holes - this makes it so you can add stuffing to the shoulders.

lines.text: Add your frosting and sprinkles (felt) with hot glue. Easy.
lines.text_raw: Add your frosting and sprinkles (felt) with hot glue. Easy.

lines.text: The head is made by stretching and hot-gluing felt over the papier-mâché.
lines.text_raw: The head is made by stretching and hot-gluing felt over the papier-mâché.

lines.text: Get some flexible beading thread. It's clear plastic and has some give so it wont hurt your EL as you move around. Whip-stitch it around the EL going all the way down the length of the pants.
lines.text_raw: Get some flexible beading thread. It's clear plastic and has some give so it wont hurt your EL as you move around. Whip-stitch it around the EL going all the way down the length of the pants.

lines.text: You can be a super cool maker and use an Ardruino to create your sequencer. OR you can be a lazy, last-minute costume maker like me and buy a sequencer ready-made. :/
lines.text_raw: You can be a super cool maker and use an Ardruino to create your sequencer. OR you can be a lazy, last-minute costume maker like me and buy a sequencer ready-made. :/

lines.text: The 9v battery ran out in about an hour, so I put together a pack of 6 AA batteries to replace it.
lines.text_raw: The 9v battery ran out in about an hour, so I put together a pack of 6 AA batteries to replace it.

lines.text: I hid a shuffle player and battery-powered speaker in the foot for maximum Nyan annoyance.
lines.text_raw: I hid a shuffle player and battery-powered speaker in the foot for maximum Nyan annoyance.

guide.summary: Nyan Cat costume, with personal soundtrack and EL wire pants.
guide.title: Nyan Cat Costume with EL Rainbow
